name: k-nn
description: Implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors algorithm for classification.

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: Array of numerical and categorical features for new data point to classify.

inputs.name: train
inputs.description: Array of two elements, first being a feature array and second a class, to add to training data.

parameters.name: batch-train
parameters.description: Array of two elements, first being a feature array and second a class, to add to training data.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Array of types for attributes. If numerial, []. Otherwise, array of categories for categorical variable.

parameters.name: classifications
parameters.description: Array of strings corresponding to class labels
